revision.text: The shard case is an item given by professor Oak once you have beaten the kanto indigo league once.The shard case is used to collect shards,which are obtained by defeating Pokemon of the respective type.
revision.comment: Protected "[[Shard Case]]": Protecting the whole wiki lets go ([Edit=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite) [Move=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite) [Delete=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite) [Protect=Allow only autoconfirmed users] (indefinite))
